explanation: The objects involved in completing the task are Plate, CreditCard, Bench, Shelf, Statue, and Platform. We need to move a credit card and plate to a bench, set a plate with a credit card on the shelf with the statue, put a plate with a credit card on the shelf, place the credit card on a plate on a bench, place the credit card on the plate to place it in front of the trophy, and put a plate with a credit card on a black platform.
